# taskIdentifier

**Instance Property**

An identifier uniquely identifying the task within a given session.

## Declaration

```swift
var taskIdentifier: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is unique only within the context of a single session; tasks in other sessions may have the same [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTask/taskIdentifier] value.

## Obtaining general task information

- **currentRequest**: The URL request object currently being handled by the task.
- **originalRequest**: The original request object passed when the task was created.
- **response**: The server’s response to the currently active request.
- **taskDescription**: An app-provided string value for the current task.
- **error**: An error object that indicates why the task failed.
